hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
SET @geo = geography::Point(:lat, :lon, 4326)
SELECT rel.[RealtyID] AS [RealtyId], adr.[Latitude], adr.[Longitude], adr.[AddressLine], rel.[AddressDetail], rel.[RentValue], rel.[SaleValue], CONVERT(FLOAT, (@geo.STDistance(geography::Point(adr.[Latitude], adr.[Longitude], 4326))) / 1000) AS [Distance] FROM [dbo].[Realty] AS rel INNER JOIN [dbo].[Address] AS adr ON rel.[AddressID] = adr.[AddressID] WHERE (@geo.STDistance(geography::Point([Latitude], [Longitude], 4326))) / 1000 < :distance
